Texto: 
red mass in right side of nose extending into nasopharynx
patient is scheduled for resection of tumor.
• enhancing mass arising in sphenopalatine foramen
• widening of the pterygopalatine fossa
• mass extends into the nasal cavity, nasopharynx and invades the sphenoid sinus.
juvenile nasopharyngeal angiofibroma (jna)
• juvenile angiofibroma
• squamous cell carcinoma
• adenoid cystic carcinoma
• rhabdomyosarcoma
15 year old boy presents with nosebleeds and nasal mass
